channel.title: Delta need help with attackable custom npc
channel.description: hey guys i just made 1 custom npc thx to a tutorial but i want to make another one attackbable like its gonna be one of my bosses in the server so can i have a tutorial of an attackable cusotm npc?

item.title: Delta need help with attackable custom npc
item.dc:creator: @knight60two knight60two
item.description:
@knight60two wrote:

uhmm the good news is it worked but the bad news is when i click attack it wont attack him?

oh ya instead of him holding a halberd i want him to hold a whip

EDIT: what do i type to make him attackable in client.java

Read full topic
item.source: Delta need help with attackable custom npc

item.title: Delta need help with attackable custom npc
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

Make sure you have an attack option in your class5 (client-sided) then in your npc.cfg make sure you have added the NPC, HP, and respawn time there.

Read full topic
item.source: Delta need help with attackable custom npc

item.title: Delta need help with attackable custom npc
item.dc:creator: @Jack_Bower Jack Bower
item.description:
@Jack_Bower wrote:

Edit your N.P.C. definition class (probably class 5 not sure because Delta is terrible), there should be examples of it in the class such as:

    if (i == ##) {
	CLASSNAME.actions = new String[5];
	CLASSNAME.actions[1] = "Attack";
	CLASSNAME.combatLevel = #;
	CLASSNAME.name = "NPCNAMEHERE";
    }

You also might need to edit your First clicks if it doesn’t automatically attack.

EDIT: This should be under Client Help.

Read full topic
item.source: Delta need help with attackable custom npc

item.title: Delta need help with attackable custom npc
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The attack option is client sided in Class5, it’s how some cheat clients attack supposedly “unattackable” NPC’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Delta need help with attackable custom npc
